title: Hour 1 - Chris Haynes (07-31-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 - Chris Haynes (07-31-20)
description:
Chris Haynes talks to Dan about the restart of the NBA. Chris says the crowd noise is too loud in the stadium and the players done react to it. Chris says it was weird to see NBA players sitting in the stands watching other games. Chris called Lebron James end of game defense; a crotch defender.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
